Html:
Hi,

I'm trying to make Scene Graph Display to work in my own project, so I can fix a bug in it.

For this, I follow the User Manual but when I activate the Scene Graph Display, the form opens but after this it freezes and doesn't throw me an exception.

To activate the Display I suscribed to the key pressed event to call the method that makes and instance, launches fs.RunTool();, etc.

I wondered if there was a especific order that you have to call things to get this work, like call fs.UpdatePickedObjectDrawing(); after base.Draw();, or the other way round. Or if someone know how to solve these.

Thank U for u`re time.

Please check out the code posted on this thread: http://goblinxna.codeplex.com/Thread/View.aspx?ThreadId=52464 

Please let me know if it still doesn't solve your problem.

Ohan
